original_text: and shall sprinkle with his right finger some of the oil that is in his left hand seven times before the Lord.
korean_text: 오른쪽 손가락으로 왼쪽 손의 기름을 조금 찍어 여호와 앞에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shall sprinkle with his right finger
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 오른손 손가락으로 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: that is in his left hand
